name: Zombie World VR
description:
Oculus Quest VR Game

Save the world from a Zombie Pandemic. In this adventure you will have to save people from a Zombie invasion. Do your best to reach the top scores and complete the 3 levels to finish the game.

The game is pre-release version, I'd like to get feedbacks and reviews to know if as a player you like the gameplay and scenario.

Update logs :

  • Enhanced graphics
  • New scenes (Japan reworked, Farm)
  • Fixed gameplay bugs
  • Scenarization of the game
  • Name and progression saved
    • AI and mechanic adjustments
